Package utils

package utils
  • Class
    Description
    Constants
    Constants used throughout the BTO Management System.
    DateUtils
    Utility class providing date formatting and validation operations.
    FileUtils
    Utility class for file operations in the BTO Management System.
    TablePrinter
    Utility class for printing formatted tables in CLI applications.
    UIFormatter
    Provides consistent UI formatting for the BTO Management System command-line interface.
    UIFormatter.ColorType
    Semantic color types for different UI elements.
